de.esoco.lib.logging

Class LogRecordFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.expression.function.AbstractFunction<T,java.lang.String>
        • de.esoco.lib.expression.function.TokenStringFormat<LogRecord>
          • de.esoco.lib.logging.LogRecordFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Function<LogRecord,java.lang.String>, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class LogRecordFormat
extends de.esoco.lib.expression.function.TokenStringFormat<LogRecord>
    Special token string transformation that transforms log records into strings. It defines several additional tokens that refer to the fields of the transformed log record. All tokens support the formatting options of the base class. The following list shows the available tokens (in short|long form where applicable) with the data type of the token in brackets:
    • l|level: the description of the log level [LogLevel]
    • m|message: the log message [String]
    • t|time: the log time in milliseconds [long]
    • c|cause: the causing error (may be NULL) [Throwable]
    • package: the name of the package where the logging call occurred
    • class: the name without package of the class where the logging call occurred
    • method: the name of the method where the logging call occurred
    • stack: the stack trace of the code where the logging call occurred, in a multi-line format similar to Throwable.printStacktrace()
    • stacktop: like stack but only prints the topmost 3 stacktrace elements
    • file: the name of the source file in which the logging call occurred
    • line: the number of the source code line where the logging call occurred
